title: Increase Cake stake limit to earn other coins
body: please increase cake stake limit from 100 to 200 per user to earn better rewards in other coins. When the user chooses to harvest the stake 5% of the earning should be used to buyback cake and then burn that amount of cake from the circulating supply of cake.
author: 0x08A6A29923a3F4B8763331b131b44A5A8d045Cb9
